lead_paragraph: The United States suffered a disconcerting 2-0 loss to Guatemala in a World Cup qualifier that raised more questions about where the team was headed under Coach Jurgen Klinsmann.

headline.print_headline: Guatemala Stuns the U.S. in a Qualifier
headline.main: Guatemala Stuns the U.S. in a Qualifier

snippet: The United States suffered a disconcerting 2-0 loss to Guatemala in a World Cup qualifier that raised more questions about where the team was headed under Coach Jurgen Klinsmann.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Guatemala defeats United States, 2-0, in World Cup qualifier; other soccer matches noted.
